co2-calculation: Assumption: similar production and process as white wheat flour.
author: je
references: 1. Wikipedia specification of different flours in Switzerland: http://de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mehl
calculation-process-documentation: Flour from wheat including still ca. 75% of the corn and with a mineral content of 0,64 - 0.90 % (2), coarser than white flour (1). Is in between of white flour and ry flour. Does not contain solely endosperm, but also some bran and germ.
name: Halbweissmehl
comments: Not clear if the process is a coarser grinding than white flour or if there is one grinding process and then the separation of different flours depending on size
